title: Benadryl Logo
content:
Hello Typophiles,

Can someone help me identify the font used in the Benadryl logo? I've been looking for a while with no luck. Could it be a custom job?  
Thanks so much for any replies!

Best,  
Per

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131700im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-10-14%20at%2011_6041.38.32%20AM.jpg)

Font: 

 TheSans LF 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131700/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: raybanone

comments.content: May be [TheSans LF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131700/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/thesans) with /e and /a terminals reworked...
Hey, that's very close! Looks like you're right on that one! Thanks!
